name: Pong graphic
description:
This is a Pong project made with pygame and python.

You can play with 1 or 2 players.

To move, use S and X for the player 1 and ↑ ↓ for the player 2

If you want, you can change the resolution, the ball speed ... in the settings.py file in the game files.

Changelog :

v1.1 : change font design
